DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy low-volume bowel preparation versus high-volume bowel preparation bowel cleanse hospitalized patient undergoing colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: The Affect Low-Volume Bowel Preparation Hospitalized Patients Colonoscopies
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Inpatient colonoscopy 2 . Age 18 year old 3 . Able give consent 4 . Split dose colonoscopy patient Exclusion criterion : 1 . Unable give consent 2 . Pregnant lactate woman 3 . Renal impairment ( GFR < 30 ) 4 . Ileus 5 . Ascites 6 . Toxic megacolon 7 . Gastrointestinal obstruction 8 . Allergy study drug 9 . Toxic colitis 10 . Not able split dose bowel preparation use 11 . Contraindication bowel preparation 12 . Risk aspiration 13 . Risk severe cardiac arrhythmia
